Razdan responded to allegations made by Kangana Ranaut’s sister Rangoli Chandel, that she has no right to discuss Indian politics because she isn’t a citizen of the country. However, she questioned Kangana’s agenda and reminded Rangoli that it was Mahesh Bhatt who gave Kangana her big break in Bollywood.
